Reviews.Title: Nice, inexpensive flatscreen
Reviews.Author: Sgt Jim Harman "cybercop106"
Reviews.Content: Payed about $300 during a sale at WalMart for it about 8 mos ago. Nice flatscreen with great sound, good pic and all the plugs you need including USB, S-Video and extra RCA jacks on the side.

Reviews.Title: its a great value
Reviews.Author: Joseph Matthew Stroud "The Mechanic"
Reviews.Content: This works great as a computer monitor or watching movies. Except that it struggles with black and viewing angles.

Reviews.Title: RCA 26 inch LCD
Reviews.Author: Reviews by Butt Eye "Reviewed By Butt Eye"
Reviews.Content: Well it works, but it is not a nice tight picture it has the nativeresolution  1360 x 768 and that would be okay for a small 15 inchbut when you stretch that resolution out on a 26 inch, it justgets blurry, period, not a tight screen size works but sucks.Crap Just another review by Butt Eye.

Reviews.Title: Nice TV
Reviews.Author: Kedar
Reviews.Content: I have been using this TV for 3 years now & using it as my only TV. It runs for about 4-5 hours daily on average & I haven't had any issues with it at all.Sound is not bad at all. The 60Hz doesn't really show in the small size. Colors are the same as they were on day one. TV is just as bright as it was on day one.The only down size is I bought it for 499$ at Walmart at the time & now they are cheaper :(
